entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as not wanting to shout again and being uncomfortable in his chair.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's who is gentle and tries to reassure him about his skills in Defense Against the Dark Arts.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who looks around suspiciously at Hermione.

entities.name: viktor
entities.description: A wizard from Durmstrang who said Harry knew how to do things even he didn't.

entities.name: last year
entities.description: The time period when Harry was the only person able to throw off the Imperius Curse completely.

relationships.description: Viktor said something about Harry's abilities.
Hermione tried to reassure Harry about his skills in Defense Against the Dark Arts.
Ron asked Hermione what Viktor said about Harry.
Hermione quoted something Viktor said about Harry.
